Work

  • OSM-Hashtag Tracker

    I designed the front-end for this amazing api built by Marc Farra that tracks a hashtag used for OpenStreetMap edits.

    The site for it has been taken down, but we're doing a bunch of work to scale this concept to something that'll be useful for Mapathons & emergency mapping.

  • Your Body, (Not) Your Choice

    An interactive map explaining abortion restriction laws. Built in Bootstrap, D3, Javascript.

  • UW-Madison Map

    Hand drawn map of the University of Wisconsin-Madison to celebrate the actual reputation most of the locations have.

  • Plaid Map

    I made a plaid map.

  • Madison's Sub Problem

    Voronoi map showing nearest sandwich shop given a spot in Madison. Built with D3, OpenStreetMaps, QGIS.

  • Your Body, (Not) Your Choice

    An interactive map explaining abortion restriction laws. Built in Bootstrap, D3, Javascript.
